For the guacamole: 1 garlic clove, crushed to a paste
default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Season the steak strips with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Heat the olive oil in a pan, then fry the steak for 1-2 minutes on both sides (for medium), or until cooked to your liking. Remove from the pan and allow to rest on a warm plate.
For the guacamole, mash the avocado and garlic together with a fork, and then mix in the remaining guacamole ingredients.
To serve, wrap the steak, guacamole and yoghurt up in two tortilla wrap.
title: Fajitas with guacamole
